subject: News
content: On D+1 day, 22.09.16, Traffic block permitted at 09:00hrs. Staff testubg akk gears, working at field undeterred in lashing rains.

subject: News
content: CSTE/C/SC with Dy.CSTE/C/BZA jointly addressed officers @ 9.00 hrs on 18.09.2016 in DRM Conference hall with an inspiring speech.

subject: News
content: CSTE/C/SC with Dy.CSTE/C/BZA addressed the gathering of Officers, Supervisors, ESM/MSM staff @ 11.30 hrs on 18.09.2016 in the institute hall with informative videos.
